title: Men's voices : Digital Storytelling project (Indigenous men)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
abstract: Ten stories of culture, country, family and separation
description: Ten Indigenous men share their stories and memories of family, country and culture through this ACMI digital storytelling workshop held on 10-13 December 2007, in partnership with Mens Line Australia.
